Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery slightly ribbed vessel, the interior bears traces of a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of three lines of red-painted (?) Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394606) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394606)
